name: Hrvoje Pavlinovic
title: Senior backend engineer scaling interactive commerce at {{TILT_URL}}
heroParagraphs: Wannabe fit dad of 2 and a husband to a beautiful wife. I am passionate about programming, which is quite neat considering I do that for a living. As you can imagine, my schedule is quite busy, but I love every second of it. Besides family and programming, I adore football, and I believe that Bitcoin can change the world for the better.

Quick workout sessions, occasional football game, cycling and recently padel (don't hate pls, my knees can't put up with football anymore) keep my head clear and stop my body from gaining too much weight (because I'm stealing candies from my kids, for their own good of course).

I like building performant software and making complex things simple, currently looking after Tilt's backend by day and exploring new ideas and concepts once the house is quiet (or usually when I'm in bathroom).

12+ years in the business, paved my way through thick and thin by working in web3, automotive, health care, commerce, media, and whatnot industries. When it comes to numbers, I managed to scale systems past 1.7B requests per month.

Still curious, still learning, grateful and excited for the future. I have already achieved more than I ever imagined I will, but bonus points for financial independence, living up to see my kids grow up and enjoy life, creating my own product(s), building a house with a pool, and travelling the whole world.
